properties.name: graphql.endpoint
properties.description: Required: Endpoint of Hasura API; source URL from where to fetch objects.

properties.name: graphql.in-memory-cache-size
properties.description: GraphQL API cache size in MByte.

properties.name: graphql.headers
properties.description: Map of key-value http headers to be passed along with any GraphQL call.

properties.name: elastic.base-url
properties.description: Required: endpoint of Elasticsearch API; target URL to push search objects.
